title: This game is rigged lmao
body: How is it that I can stomp games or get good teams and win every game, then the second I get to promos I get trolls and lose 2 in a row? Not to mention 99% of my losses are from junglers this season. Honestly so over this. I have a 60% win ratio and cant even climb the ranks cuz this bullshit that keeps me from winning promos.

Yes.

People will call bullshit all day, but this is completely accurate.

No matter what anyone says, if you duo, you get degenerate scum, if you are in promos- you get degenerate scum. If you win too much, you get degenerate scum.

How else do you think they keep that 50% win chance within 1% stat? You think because they designed such an insanely good matching system??

Fuck no, they force it. Duh. By giving you tardomungos.

Riot fucks you when they want to fuck you. They do it so often I don't even think they enjoy it anymore, I think they are just being dominant.

Confirmation bias, going by this post.

Rigging games to force lower winrates is basically impossible, since the average winrate is exactly 50%. Plus there is no reason to rig games.

> Plus there is no reason to rig games.

Lets give folks the benefit of doubt here and assume theres some gain Riot would make from being unethical.
For every single one of the reasons people claim riot would rig games I can tell yall it takes so much less work to just use functional MMR. 



Add more grind? Lower points gained per match. Or just make it Slant so you need over 50% WR to even climb.
Keep more player out of X rank? change its MMR range. Its a population curve for fucks sake. They can adjust what percentile of player can even achieve a rank  LITREALLY AT WILL!
Make promos harder? Swap the MMR on the account out for the MMR  mean value for the next rank if its not at or above that. Remove promo helper completely.

Riot has multiple options that will function at 100% reliability Every single time for every single player that never have to rely on RNG pray to god some players behave as expected with statistical interference that's not currently even achievable via modern tech.

Its insanely easier to target 1 player then to try and account for 10 individual variables, like this should be self evident.

Proactive systems are harder to make then reactive ones when dealing with automation. Subjective judgment is also hard to automate.

Here is the funny thing, the only people who stand to gain if there was rigged or Forced 50% are the people who tell you their Ranks don't match their skill. Cuz riot has full control over their MMR system and its variables they can make it accomplish what they want at way less effort.

Bet for the sake of argument lets say you really wanna fuck over Player X?  Guess what you can do to them during a soft reset?
